name: Basic Track Information
description: Fetches basic information about each track, including name, artist(s), and release date.

name: Artist Collaborations
description: Lists all artist collaborations and the number of tracks each collaboration appears on.

name: Top 10 Most Streamed Tracks
description: Lists the top 10 tracks by total stream count in descending order.

name: Average Danceability by Release Year
description: Calculates the average danceability of tracks released each year, providing a year-over-year look at this characteristic.

name: Tracks with Highest Playlist Count per Vendor
description: Finds the track(s) with the highest playlist count for each vendor, showing the most featured tracks on each platform.

name: Tracks' average rank across all vendors' charts
description: Lists tracks and their average rank across all vendors' charts.

name: Average Popularity (Track Count) by Release Month
description: Calculates the average number of playlist features for tracks released in each month, indicating seasonal popularity trends.

name: Top 5 Artists by Total Playlist Features
description: Identifies the top 5 artists by total playlist count across all vendors, highlighting the most consistently featured artists.

name: Year with Highest Average Chart Ranking
description: Computes the average count value in Track_Charts for each release year and returns the year with the highest average ranking, indicating the year with the highest-performing tracks.

name: Distribution of Tracks by BPM Ranges and Mode
description: Groups tracks by BPM ranges and mode, then counts tracks in each group.

name: Most Frequently Featured Artists in Top Chart Positions
description: Lists artists with the highest number of tracks appearing in the top 10 chart positions across all vendors.

name: Correlation Analysis Between Playlist Count and Chart Ranking
description: Analyzes the correlation between playlist count and chart ranking for each track, identifying potential patterns in playlist popularity and chart success.
